name: CVE-2016-3213
description: The Web Proxy Auto Discovery (WPAD) protocol implementation in Microsoft Windows Vista SP2, Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2, Windows RT 8.1, Windows 10 Gold and 1511, and Internet Explorer 9 through 11 has an improper fallback mechanism, which allows remote attackers to gain privileges via NetBIOS name responses, aka "WPAD Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability."
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_rt_8.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:internet_explorer:10:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2012:r2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:*:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1511:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_8.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:r2:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:internet_explorer:9:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2012:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:internet_explorer:11:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
